subject: Basketball
Deaths (Obituaries)
Frauds and Swindling
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Days after being named college basketball player of the year in 1951, White and several Long Island University teammates were implicated in a national point-shaving scandal.
snippet: Days after being named college basketball player of the year in 1951, White and several Long Island University teammates were implicated in a national point-shaving scandal.
